summary: The diff implements the requested Publisher Profile page: it adds an authenticated route at `/publishers/$id`, makes publisher names navigate to that route, adds a profile page UI with required fields, includes a back button, and adds a React Query hook to fetch a single publisher with loading and not-found states. No missing requirements are evident from the provided diff summary, but there are a couple of additional UI elements not explicitly requested (inactive badge, possibly notes).

hallucinated_features.description: Publisher Profile page displays an "Inactive" badge when the publisher is not active.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 did not request showing active/inactive status on the profile page; only name, group number, overseer/assistant Yes/No, and privileges were required.

hallucinated_features.description: Publisher Profile page appears to include displaying publisher notes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Notes are mentioned in the file summary, but notes display was not part of REQ-3 (and the diff excerpt does not show a notes requirement).
